cit1.CITATION: A review on the human memory architecture shows that the information acquired from the environment by our sensory organs is initially stored in the sensory registers [1, 2] which is later transferred into the STM [3] in its readily available state for a very short duration of time (≤ 9 s).

cit2.CITATION: A review on the human memory architecture shows that the information acquired from the environment by our sensory organs is initially stored in the sensory registers [1, 2] which is later transferred into the STM [3] in its readily available state for a very short duration of time (≤ 9 s).

cit3.CITATION: A review on the human memory architecture shows that the information acquired from the environment by our sensory organs is initially stored in the sensory registers [1, 2] which is later transferred into the STM [3] in its readily available state for a very short duration of time (≤ 9 s).

cit4.CITATION: Parts of the information saved in STM are then latched into the WM [3] for a short duration (around 30 s) for subsequent processing (like reasoning, decision making, and the like).

cit36.CITATION: The Bi-directional Associative Memory (BAM) [21] has an advantage that it can encode input-output relationship in fuzzy domain of a system, and can also retrieve the input from the output by a backward firing of the neurons.

cit46.CITATION: The scalp electric potentials, recorded by the EEG electrodes, are essentially the outcome of current signals generated from the dipolar sources due to firing (depolarization or hyperpolarization) of a large number of neurons, orthogonal to the cortical surface [31].

cit47.CITATION: Independent component analysis (ICA) [31] [32] [33] [34] [35] is a blind-source separation technique aiming at assessing the original source signals from the scalp potentials, captured by the EEG electrodes.

cit52.CITATION: Thus ICA acts as a linear spatial filter [36].

cit53.CITATION: In the present paper, the Infomax algorithm [34] of ICA is used to estimate the sources utilizing the measure of maximum entropy.

cit54.CITATION: It is important to be noted that the determination of N independent components (ICs) from N discrete-time sink signals (acquired using N EEG electrodes) using ICA linear decomposition, typically requires more than (ρ × N 2) data-points for each electrode, where N 2 is the number of weights in the demixing matrix that ICA tries to learn and ρ is any real positive number [37].

cit55.CITATION: There exist various algorithms to find the solution for EEG inverse problem in brain source localization [38] such as minimum norm algorithm, low-resolution brain electromagnetic tomography (LORETA), standardized low-resolution brain electromagnetic tomography (sLORETA), exact low-resolution brain electromagnetic tomography (eLORETA), Focal Under determined System Solution (FOCUSS) and Recursive Multiple Signal Classification (MUSIC).

cit56.CITATION: In the present paper, we use eLORETA as it can localize the deeper sources with zero localization error [39] even in the presence of measurement as well as structured biological noise [38].

cit69.CITATION: The normalized fuzzy memberships µli,k and νil,k of ali,k and blj,k respectively, for k = [1, D], l = [1, L] and i, j = [1, N], are then calculated by introducing a feature normalization (or feature scaling) technique, named as Z-score normalization or Standardization [49] [50] [51], as defined by (8) and (9).

cit70.CITATION: Thus the extracted EEG features of each channel are normalized to zero mean and unit standard deviation, thereby the non-Gaussianity of the extracted EEG features is reduced significantly [50].

cit71.CITATION: However, the Z-score normalization technique equalizes the ranges of the features into [0,1] and make them have approximately the same effect in the similarity computation [49].

cit95.CITATION: In [29] and [30], computationally intensive approaches are adopted to find the fuzzy max-min inverse Q of matrix W by maximizing a heuristic function such that the diagonal elements of matrix D (= Q o W) are close to 1 while the off-diagonal elements are reduced to zero.
